name: MCB Art Museum
description:
I made this project for my brother's birthday. He creates a lot of great, diverse, and surreal art. He pulls a lot of inspiration from nature, H.P. Lovecraft, and from his travels around this United States (he's a truck driver!). I think it's all phenomenal. If you'd like to find out more about his art, check him out at https://www.facebook.com/mcbart1217/ or https://twitter.com/ArtbyMCB

I made this in Unity with some wonderful (free!) assets that deserve recognition:

  • Ultimate Materials Lite: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/ultimate-materials-l...
  • Jemeza 5 Free Background Tracks: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/5-free-background-tracks-67932
  • Lovecraft's Diary Font: http://www.1001fonts.com/lovecrafts-diary-font.html
